title: Hong Mao Lan Tu Le Fantian
sinopse:
In Rainbow Cat and Blue Rabbit Le Fantian, various cartoon stars gather together, and the eight immortals cross the sea, showing their magical powers. Humorous sketches one after another, funny and amused, make you laugh endlessly. Rich and interesting encyclopedic knowledge, entertaining and learning. There are various forms of puzzle games, and you can use your brain.
(translated from douban)
